mapper.insert: INSERT INTO passport (nationality, gender, birth, issuing_country, passport_num, ex_date, country_number, phone_number, email, reservation_id) VALUES (#{nationality}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{issuingCountry}, #{passportNum}, #{exDate}, #{countryNumber}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{reservationId})
mapper.select: select reservation_id from reservations where pnr=#{pnr}
